byline.original: By TIM ARANGO and FALIH HASSAN

abstract: Elite Iraqi counterterrorism forces enter city limits of Mosul, which has been under Islamic State control for over two years; next phase of campaign will include fighting in civilian-heavy areas, raising complex humanitarian challenges and risking stoking sectarian tensions.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The advance is a breakthrough in efforts to reclaim the country’s second-largest city from the Islamic State, but a great deal of fighting lies ahead.
snippet: The advance is a breakthrough in efforts to reclaim the country’s second-largest city from the Islamic State, but a great deal of fighting lies ahead....

headline.main: Mosul Is Breached by Iraqi Forces, Heralding a New, Complex Phase
headline.print_headline: Elite Iraqi Forces Breach Mosul City Limits
